original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.5. Kusalattika, Cūḷantaraduka
analyzed: kusalattika cūḍantaraduka

original: Nakusalo nasappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …. Ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā upanissaye cha. (Saṅkhataṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na sappaccayaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe cha adhipatiyā upanissaye cha saṅkhatam sappaccaya sadisa

original: Nakusalaṁ nasanidassanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na sa nidassanam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ sa nidassanaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalo naanidassano dhammo kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na anidassanaḥ dhammaḥ kusalassa anidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena

original: paccayo. (Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte
analyzed: paccayaḥ nava pañhā kātabbā ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā tīṇi upanissaye purejāte

original: atthiyā avigate nava.
analyzed: atthiyā a vigate nava

original: Nakusalaṁ nasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ sappaṭighaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ naappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ narūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: na kusalam na rūpim dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe aññamaññe tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ naarūpiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na arūpim dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ arūpī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nalokiyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na kusalam na lokiyam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ lokiyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca

original: Nakusalaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na lokuttaram dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ lokuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nakusalaṁ nalokuttaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā abyākato lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na kusalam na lokuttaram dhammam paccayā abyākataḥ lokuttaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: (Cha pañhā kātabbā.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: cha pañhā kātabbā hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Nakusalaṁ nakenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na kenacid viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ kenacid viññeyyaḥ dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate aṭṭhārasa

original: Nakusalaṁ nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalam na kenaci na viññeyyam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ kenaci viññeyyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
analyzed: hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā aṭṭhārasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate aṭṭhārasa
